reviewText: Great British movies. Especially love Mrs Brown!

I've seen both Ethan Frome and Restoration. I love them. The ironic thing about Restoration
is that if Robert Downey Jr, had paid attention to the moral of this movie then he could have saved himself a stint in prison. FYI, no subtitles, no closed captions.

Her Majesty, Mrs. Brown was a good movie, interesting, and great scenery, fit for family viewing.

Ethan Frome was well done by the actors...especially Liam Niessen. A hard/sad tale of the unfairness of life's turns. A love forever lost.

Return to Brideshead was definitely not for family viewing and Restoration didn't appear to warrant a full viewing from it opening scenes. Also not for family viewing.
Love it. I enjoyed it very much. I have always enjoyed this actress. Her Majesty was the best. Thank you.

Each customer may bring onboard one personal item (purse, briefcase, laptop, etc.) plus one carry-on bag.

Your personal item must not exceed 18" L (45.72 cm) x 15" W (38.1 cm) x 8" H (20.32 cm) in order to fit under the seat in front of you.

To fit in the overhead bin, your item must not exceed: for our Airbus A320: 26" L (66 cm) x 18" W (45.72 cm) x 12" H (30.48 cm) for our EMBRAER 190: 24" L (60.96 cm) x 16" W (40.64 cm) x 10" H (25.4 cm)

I remember watching Mrs Brown on public television and remember how much I enjoyed the storyline.  I have been a Judi Dench fan for amny years since her acting in "As Time Goes By" and still enjoy watching it on public television.  The other films have now become my favorites also.
Four great movies combined in one package for a brilliant price.  Way cheaper then trying to get them all separately.
